_meanings:
{@--3@} To move upwards,
ascend, go up.
{@--1@} To cause to rise or move.

{@--5@} To cast,
throw, roll down (as dice);  
{#udIrayAmAsa salIlamakzAn#} <ls>R. 6. 18</ls>; to
discharge, drive forward.

{@--6@} To raise,
throw up; {#udIritaM rajaH#} <ls>Śi. 12. 58</ls>;  
{#udErayacCiraH#} <ls>Dk. 103</ls> expanded its
hood.

{@--1@} To be cast or
thrown upwards, excited, uttered
&c.
